column4: The processor supports the Streaming SIMD Extensions 3 instructions

column3: Instruction The processor supports PCLMULDQ instruction

column4: Indicates that the processor has the ability to write a history of the 64-bit branch to and from addresses into a memory buffer
The processor supports the MONITOR and MWAIT instructions
The processor supports the extensions to the Debug Store feature to allow for branch message storage qualified by CPL
The processor supports Intel® Virtualization Technology
The processor supports Intel® Trusted Execution Technology

column3: Enhanced Intel SpeedStep® Technology The processor supports Enhanced Intel SpeedStep Technology and implements the IA32_PERF_STS and IA32_PERF_CTL registers

column4: The processor implements the Thermal Monitor 2 thermal control circuit (TCC)

column3: Supplemental Streaming SIMD Extensions 3 The processor supports the Supplemental Streaming SIMD Extensions 3 instructions

column4: The L1 data cache mode can be set to either adaptive mode or shared mode by the BIOS

column3: Do not count on the value

column4: The processor supports FMA extensions using YMM state
The processor supports the CMPXCHG16B instruction

The processor supports the ability to disable sending Task Priority messages. When this feature flag is set, Task Priority messages may be disabled. Bit 23 (Echo TPR disable) in the IA32_MISC_ENABLE MSR controls the sending of Task Priority messages
The processor supports the Performance Capabilities MSR. IA32_PERF_CAPABILITIES register is MSR 345h

column3: Do not count on the value

column4: The processor supports PCIDs and that software may set CR4.PCIDE to 1
The processor supports the ability to prefetch data from a memory mapped device
The processor supports the Streaming SIMD Extensions 4.1 instructions
The processor supports the Streaming SIMD Extensions 4.2 instructions
The processor supports x2APIC feature
The processor supports MOVBE instruction
The processor supports the POPCNT instruction
The processor’s local APIC timer supports one-shot operation using a TSC deadline value
The processor supports the AES instruction extensions
The processor supports the XSAVE/XRSTOR processor extended states feature, the XSETBV/XGETBV instructions, and the XFEATURE_ENABLED_MASK register (XCR0)
A value of 1 indicates that the OS has enabled XSETBV/XGETBV instructions to access the XFEATURE_ENABLED_MASK register (XCR0), and support for processor extended state management using XSAVE/XRSTOR
The processor supports the AVX instruction extensions
A value of 1 indicates that the processor supports 16-bit floating-point conversion instructions
A value of 1 indicates that processor supports RDRAND instruction
